data: “It ain’t more’n onct in a lifetime,” said Jess Hutton to the crowd of friends in his store, “that luck comes thick 'n' fat to any on us 'n' so fer that reason I sent over to the mainland fer suthin' o' a liquid natur; 'n' now take hold, all hands, 'n' injie yerselves on Jess.”

"It ain't more'n onct in a lifetime," said Jess Hutton to the crowd of friends in his store, "that luck comes thick 'n' fat to any on us 'n' so fer that reason I sent over to the mainland fer suthin' o' a liquid natur; 'n' now take hold, all hands, 'n' injie yerselves on Jess."
Munn, Charles Clark, 1848-1917; Merrill, Frank T., 1848-1923 [Illustrator]
